contentencoded:
The Core Knowledge Foundation says the Common Core State Standards will help schools know what to measure, but not necessarily what to teach.


Guest: Lisa Hansel, Director of Communications, Core Knowledge Foundation.
description: The Core Knowledge Foundation says the Common Core State Standards will help schools know what to measure, but not necessarily […]
title: What to Teach
teaser: The Core Knowledge Foundation says the Common Core State Standards will help schools know what to measure, but not necessarily […]
